item.description:
Please come down to help out at our Learn to Fly Day Open House. Last year we over 500 members of the public come down to the airport and check out the activities.
This is a great opportunity to encourage people to come down to the airport and see all the great things going on here.

Activities for 2012:

  • New Airplane vendors with airplanes on display
  • Fitchburg Airplanes on display
  • Flight Sim computers
  • FCA Flight Center Instructors on hand
  • Discounted FCA Demo rides
  • Food for sale (burgers, Hotdogs, fries)

Setup Crew needs to arrives at 7:00am. Gates are open from 9:00am to 3:00pm.

If you missed last year, check out what you missed at http://www.meetup.com/FitchburgPilots/events/16548520/.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Learn to Fly Day Open House
